entry.title: Top 25 Games of the Decade (4 - 2) S01E08 (Countdown)
entry.content:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=obcDo2uIAQY Click here to watch the previous episode of Top 25 Games of the Decade
Top 25 Games of the Decade (4 - 2) S01E08 (Countdown)
As the end of the year approaches, Machinima decided it was time to count down their favorite 25 games of the decade. Join Rob Talbert as he counts down Machinima's favorite games of the last 10 years. Today, it's games 4, 3, and 2.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

entry.title: Uncharted 3 Chateau Gameplay Part 2 [HD]
entry.content:
Uncharted 3 Chateau Gameplay Part 2 [HD] Developer: Naughty Dog Release: 11/1/11 Genre: Adventure Platform: PS3 Publisher: SCEA The journey propels fortune hunter Nathan Drake on a daring trek into the heart of the Arabian Desert, a journey that pits him and his mentor Victor Sullivan against the occult treachery of a shadowy clandestine organization and its ruthless leader. When the terrible secrets of this lost city are unearthed, Drake's quest descends into a desperate bid for survival that strains the limits of his endurance and forces him to confront his deepest fears. entry.title: Constant's on Vacation! A Skate 3 Montage by Nicholson (Skate 3) Sports
entry.content:

entry.title: Top 25 Games of the Decade (7 - 5) S01E07 (Countdown)
entry.content:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-LoSvWy3WWY Click here to watch the previous episode of Top 25 Games of the Decade
Top 25 Games of the Decade (7 - 5) S01E07 (Countdown)
As the end of the year approaches, Machinima decided it was time to count down their favorite 25 games of the decade. Join Rob Talbert as he counts down Machinima's favorite games of the last 10 years. Today, it's games 7, 6, and 5.
